name: Blood Sucker
description:
Blood Sucker - Game for the GDL July GameJam 72 hours. 

First game jam ever! it was definetly a struggle at times and stressful but regardless we are super happy to be able to submit something that is playable!

This was also my first 2D project and that ofcourse followed more interesting struggles... dam tilemaps.. 

Hope you enjoy! 

Jezz
